title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example is experiencing excessive flashing.
OB: When resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all frames flash.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, avoiding unnecessary flashing.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Run the Control Example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction. 
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all frames flash.
